Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 203 of the Uniform Statutory Trust Entity Act . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-1202.03

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A record delivered by the statutory trust to the Mayor for filing pursuant to this chapter shall be signed by at least one of the trustees.
Any person may sign by an attorney in fact any record filed pursuant to this chapter.

subchapter.text: Formation; Certificate of Trust and Other Filings; Process.
